name: TIE/x7
description: Your upgrade bar loses the {cannon} and {missile} upgrade icons. After executing a 3-, 4-, or 5-speed manoeuvre, you may assign 1 evade token to your ship.

name: A-Wing Test Pilot
description: Your upgrade bar gains 1 {talent} upgrade icon. You cannot equip 2 of the same {talent} upgrade cards. You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill is "1" or lower.

name: Alliance Overhaul
description: When attacking with a primary weapon from your primary firing arc, you may roll 1 additional attack die. When attacking from your auxiliary firing arc, you may change 1 of your {eye} results to a {critical} result.

name: Andrasta
description: Your upgrade bar gains two additional {bomb} upgrade icons.

name: BTL-A4 Y-Wing
description: You cannot attack ships outside your firing arc. After you perform a primary weapon attack, you may immediately perform an attack with a {turret} secondary weapon.

name: Ghost
description: Equip the Phantom title card to a friendly Attack Shuttle and dock it to this ship. After you execute a manoeuvre, you may deploy it from your rear guides.

name: IG-2000
description: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG-2000 Upgrade card (in addition to your own pilot ability).

name: Mist Hunter
description: Your action bar gains the {barrel_roll} action icon. You must equip 1 "Tractor Beam" upgrade (paying the squad point cost as normal).

name: Phantom
description: While you are docked, the Ghost can perform primary weapon attacks from its special firing arc and, at the end of the Combat phase, it may perform an additional attack with an equipped {turret}. If it performs this attack, it cannot attack again this round.

name: Royal Guard TIE
description: You may equip up to 2 different Modification upgrades (instead of 1). You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill is "4" or lower.

name: Slave-1
description: Your upgrade bar gains the {torpedo} icon.

name: Special Ops Training
description: When attacking with a primary weapon from your primary firing arc, you may roll 1 additional attack die. If you do not, you may perform an additional attack from your auxiliary firing arc.

name: TIE Shuttle
description: Your upgrade bar loses all {missile}, {torpedo} and {bomb} upgrade icons and gains 2 {crew} upgrade icons. You cannot equip a {crew} upgrade card that costs more than 4 squad points.

name: TIE/D
description: Once per round, after you perform an attack with a {cannon} secondary weapon that costs 3 or fewer squad points, you may perform a primary weapon attack.

name: TIE/x1
description: Your upgrade bar gains the {system} upgrade icon. If you equip a {system} upgrade, its squad point cost is reduced by 4 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Black One
description: After you preform a boost or barrel roll action, you may remove 1 enemy target lock from a friendly ship at Range 1.

name: Concord Dawn Protector
description: When defending, if you are inside the attacker's firing arc and at Range 1 and the the attacker is inside your firing arc, add 1 {evade} result.

name: Millennium Falcon (Evade Version)
description: Your action bar gains the {evade} action icon.

name: Millennium Falcon (Segnor's Loop Version)
description: After you execute a 3-speed bank manoeuvre ({bank_left} or {bank_right}), if you are not touching another ship and you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token to rotate your ship 180°.

name: TIE/v1
description: After you acquire a target lock, you may perform a free evade action.

name: Virago
description: Your upgrade bar gains the {system} and {illicit} upgrade icons. You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill is "3" or lower.

name: “Heavy Scyk” Interceptor
description: Your upgrade bar gains the {cannon}, {torpedo}, or {missile} upgrade icon.

name: Assailer
description: When defending, if the targeted section has a reinforce token, you may change 1 {eye} result to a {evade} result.

name: Dauntless
description: After you execute a maneuver that causes you to overlap another ship, you may perform 1 free action. Then receive 1 stress token.

name: Dutyfree
description: When performing a jam action, you may choose an enemy ship at range 1-3 (instead of at Range 1-2).

name: Jaina's Light
description: When defending, once per attack, if you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard it and draw another faceup Damage card.

name: Vector
description: After you execute a manoeuvre, you may deploy up to 4 docked ships (instead of 2).

name: Impetuous
description: After you perform an attack that destroys an enemy ship, you may acquire a target lock.

name: Moldy Crow
description: During the End phase, do not remove unused focus tokens from your ship.

name: Shadow Caster
description: After you perform an attack that hits, if the defender is inside your mobile firing arc at Range 1-2, you may assign the defender 1 tractor beam token.

name: ST-321
description: When acquiring a target lock, you may lock onto any target in the play area.

name: Dodonna's Pride
description: When you perform a coordinate action, you may choose 2 friendly ships (instead of 1). Those ships may each perform 1 free action.

name: Instigator
description: After you perform a recover action, recover 1 additional shield.

name: Quantum Storm
description: At the start of the End phase, if you have 1 or fewer energy tokens, gain 1 energy token.

name: Requiem
description: When you deploy a ship, treat its pilot skill as “8” until the end of the round.

name: Tantive IV
description: Your fore section upgrade bar gains 1 additional {crew} and 1 additional {team} upgrade icon.

name: Bright Hope
description: A reinforce token assigned to your fore section adds 2 {evade} results (instead of 1).

name: Outrider
description: When you have a {cannon} Upgrade card equipped, you cannot perform primary weapon attacks and you may perform {cannon} secondary weapon attacks against ships outside your firing arc.

name: Hound's Tooth
description: After you are destroyed, before you are removed from the play area, you may deploy the Nashta Pup ship. It may not attack this round.

name: Suppressor
description: Once per round, after you acquire a target lock on an enemy ship, you may remove 1 focus, evade, or blue target lock token from that ship.

name: Punishing One
description: Increase your primary weapon value by 1.
